title: Nobita no Kekkon Zenya: The night before a wedding
alternative_title: Doraemon: Nobita's the Night Before a Wedding, ドラえもん のび太の結婚前夜 The night before a wedding
description: Nobita is very depressed. He thinks that he will not be able to marry. So Doraemon bring him to the future to see his own marriage.
